mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEES_T( EMPLOYEE_NO, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, DEPARTMENT_NO, RANK_NO, PASSWORD, PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH, EMPLOYEE_STATUS, HIRE_DATE, EXIT_DATE ) VALUES ( EMPLOYEES_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{depart.departmentNo}, #{rank.rankNo}, #{password}, #{profilePicturePath}, #{employeeStatus}, #{hireDate}, #{exitDate, jdbcType=DATE} )
mapper.select: SELECT E.EMPLOYEE_NO, E.NAME, E.EMAIL, E.PASSWORD, E.PHONE, E.ADDRESS, E.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH, D.DEPARTMENT_NO, R.RANK_NO, E.EMPLOYEE_STATUS, E.HIRE_DATE, E.EXIT_DATE, D.PARENT_DEPART_NO, D.DEPART_NAME, R.RANK_TITLE FROM EMPLOYEES_T E INNER JOIN DEPARTMENTS_T D ON D.DEPARTMENT_NO = E.DEPARTMENT_NO INNER JOIN RANKS_T R ON R.RANK_NO = E.RANK_NO ORDER BY E.EMPLOYEE_NO

SELECT E.EMPLOYEE_NO, E.NAME, E.EMAIL, E.PASSWORD, E.PHONE, E.ADDRESS, E.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH, D.DEPARTMENT_NO, R.RANK_NO, E.EMPLOYEE_STATUS, E.HIRE_DATE, E.EXIT_DATE, D.PARENT_DEPART_NO, D.DEPART_NAME, R.RANK_TITLE FROM EMPLOYEES_T E INNER JOIN DEPARTMENTS_T D ON D.DEPARTMENT_NO = E.DEPARTMENT_NO INNER JOIN RANKS_T R ON R.RANK_NO = E.RANK_NO WHERE E.EMPLOYEE_NO = #{employeeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEES_T SET NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{address}, DEPARTMENT_NO = #{depart.departmentNo}, RANK_NO = #{rank.rankNo}, PASSWORD =#{password}, PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH =#{profilePicturePath}, EMPLOYEE_STATUS =#{employeeStatus}, HIRE_DATE =#{hireDate}, EXIT_DATE =#{exitDate, jdbcType=DATE} WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO= #{employeeNo}
